mods.name: Nocturne Core
mods.description: Capacitor hums in dim light; steadier discharge after dusk.

mods.name: Crescent Core
mods.description: Balanced lunar cycle: reliable output, low strain.

mods.name: Tidemoon Core
mods.description: Releases power in tidal gravity waves.

mods.name: Umbra Core
mods.description: Shadowed force channel; shots dim the air.

mods.name: Fullmoon Core
mods.description: Peak lunar output; bright, clean impacts.

firearm.onHit: Target makes STR save or is knocked prone (1/turn)

mods.name: Resonance Core
mods.description: Harmonic matrix resonates with spoken magic.

mods.name: Nightglass Core
mods.description: Perfect clarity; energy holds shape longer.

reaction.oncePerRest: Force a reroll of a hit creature’s next save

mods.name: Starfall Core
mods.description: Condensed astral crystal matrix; shots glitter like falling stars.

firearm.critEffect: On crit, splash 1d6 force to creature within 10 ft

mods.name: Moonstill Core
mods.description: The capacitor’s center is perfectly still.

mods.name: Impact Bore
mods.description: Heavy muzzle impulse knocks targets back.

mods.name: Echo Repeater Barrel
mods.description: A faint second pulse follows the first.

mods.name: Moonflare Barrel
mods.description: Radiant lunar bursts ignite the air.

mods.name: Nightglass Barrel
mods.description: Transparent crystal channel with perfect clarity.

mods.name: Riftline Barrel
mods.description: Line shot that slices through a path.

firearm.onHit: Target makes WIS save or has disadvantage on next attack (1/turn)
Splash 1d6 force to creature within 5 ft (1/turn)

mods.name: Bloodmoon Barrel
mods.description: Shots leave violet afterimages that mark prey.

firearm.onHit: Target is marked; next hit deals +1d6 (until end of your next turn) (1/turn)
Target makes STR save or is restrained until start of its next turn (1/turn)

mods.name: Moonshard Prism Barrel
mods.description: Moonshard splits beams into reflected arcs.

mods.name: Hollow Night Barrel
mods.description: The shot arrives with silence and cold.

firearm.onHit: Target can’t take reactions until start of its next turn (1/turn)

reaction.oncePerRest: Turn a miss into a hit

mods.name: Rapier Blade
mods.description: Thin thrusting rapier grown from clear amethyst.

mods.name: Greatsword Blade
mods.description: Massive two-handed blade; slow, decisive arcs.

mods.name: Greataxe Blade
mods.description: Heavy cleaver built for brutal chops.

mods.name: Glaive Blade
mods.description: Polearm blade grown long and thin.

mods.name: Crescent Blade
mods.description: A waxing-moon crescent blade that favors momentum.

mods.name: Chainblade
mods.description: Segmented blade snaps and recoils like a living thing.

mods.name: Moonreaver Blade
mods.description: Consumes reflected light; strikes shimmer violet.

mods.name: Timefracture Blade
mods.description: Temporal slicing edge; wounds arrive a heartbeat late.

melee.onHit: Delayed 1d6 force at start of target’s next turn (1/turn)
Target takes 1d4 slashing at start of its next turn (1/turn)

mods.name: Charged Edge
mods.description: Lightning trapped in the lattice bites on impact.

melee.onHit: Target’s speed -10 ft until start of your next turn (1/turn)

mods.name: Hook Edge
mods.description: Hooks catch armor seams and wrists.

melee.onCrit: Target drops one held item (STR save negates)

melee.onHit: If you hit the same target again before end of your next turn, add +1d6 force (1/turn)
Target has disadvantage on its next CON save (1/turn)

mods.name: Phase Edge
mods.description: Part of the blade phases; strikes ignore mundane barriers.

mods.name: Grav Edge
mods.description: Cuts carry weight; enemies feel pinned.

melee.onHit: Target STR save or knocked prone (1/turn)
Target WIS save or has disadvantage on next attack (1/turn)
If in dim light or night: +1d6 necrotic (1/turn)

mods.name: Silvernight Edge
mods.description: Cuts glow faintly; reveals the unseen.

melee.onHit: Target can’t benefit from invisibility until start of your next turn (1/turn)

melee.onCrit: Target’s AC -1 until end of combat (max -2)

melee.onHit: Your next attack vs that target gains +1d4 to hit (1/turn)
Target can’t take reactions until start of its next turn (1/turn)

reaction.oncePerRest: Force a reroll of a hit creature’s saving throw

mods.name: Voidfang Edge
mods.description: Existence-rending strikes leave a violet void-burn.

mods.name: Starweave Edge
mods.description: Threads of starlight lace the wound.

melee.onHit: Splash 1d6 force to creature within 10 ft (1/turn)

mods.name: Nightprophet Edge
mods.description: The blade whispers the next moment.

reaction.oncePerRest: Turn a miss into a hit

mods.name: Gravity Well Edge
mods.description: A tiny gravity well blooms at the cut.

melee.onHit: Target is pulled 10 ft toward you (1/turn)

mods.name: Moonstep Rig
mods.description: A faint blink between crescent shadows.

mods.name: Gravitic Anchors
mods.description: Boot anchors bite into the ground.

mods.name: Nightcloak Rig
mods.description: A veil of nightglass hides motion.

stealth.bonus: +2 to Stealth checks (while in dim light)

reaction.intercept: Impose disadvantage on an attack vs ally within 5 ft (1/round)

mods.name: Starward Compass
mods.description: Reads the sky; step exactly where needed.
